description: This file implements functions related to the creation of a Slap Object Broker in the SLAP (Service Logic Aggregation Plane) framework. It contains licensing information, module description, and a function to instantiate a new object broker.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapCreateObjBroker(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and returns a new Slap Obj Broker object handle, utilizing the internal creation function SlapOboCreate with provided context handles.
